channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 06:23 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk Region
item.description: 🟡 06:23 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk Region#m_Nikopol_and_Nikopol_Territorial_Community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
